column7: Description
Description
Show/Edit GPS infos of local photos through a map.
GUI for ExifTool to patch Canon ISO information.
Write Picasa face recognition information as XMP to your images.
Uses facial recognition technology to assist in the automatic application of IPTC and XMP image metadata.
Updates EXIF/IPTC/XMP/ID3/Office metadata in video, audio, docs, camera raw and vector images. Uses ExifTool.
Can update IPTC and XMP metadata in images, video, and audio. Uses Adobe's XMP Toolkit to read/write.
Collection of tools for XMP metadata.
Clean any EXIF unwanted data from your digital pictures.
View EXIF tags.
GUI front-end for ExifTool to perform simple operations.
Extract EXIF information from image files.
Copy metadata between sets of multiple images using ExifTool.
Lets you to erase/remove photographic metadata.
Allows you change the time, date, and other information stored in the metadata of your photos.
Graphical front-end for ExifTool with drag-and-drop and command-line parameters.
GUI extension for the ExifTool with command-line parameters.
Software for viewing, editing, and creating metadata.
Extract some tags using ExifTool.
Allows you to easily delete all metadata tags.
Powerful command line utility.
GUI for the ExifTool with some editing features.
Set of command line utilities that extract, add, remove, copy, and  replace metadata.
Restore EXIF metadata from an original image.
Command line utility and C++ Library
Analyze your usage of the focal length of your lenses, ISO, shutter speed and aperture.
Allows you to easily and effectively delete entire EXIF/IPTC/XMP information from image files.
Show and change geo and IPTC/XMP/EXIF metadata in image files. Batch changes possible
GUI extension for the ExifTool.
Editor for IPTC and XMP metadata.
Batch image processing tool
Editor for IPTC and PLUS photo metadata with Adobe CS3 to CS5.
Image viewer that also supports viewing image metadata
A tool that adds title, description and keyword tags to photos.
Reference management software that uses BibTeX.
Allows to drop quickly and easily tags over selected images directly by typing them on the keyboard. Pluginable.
View EXIF information stored in JPEG files.
A tool for stripping/cleaning/removing unnecessary metadata.
Software for creating, viewing, editing, and saving metadata as text file for your photos.
Edit, modify, add, delete any metadata from audio, video, photo, text...
Toolbox composed of a GUI application, a CLI application and a library, to anonymize/remove metadata
A tool to explore files by their XMP metadata.
A tool to view and edit IPTC and XMP metadata.
Allows you read and edit metadata within your digital photos.
Allows you read, analyze and edit metadata. The main feature of the program is the ability to simultaneously edit any number of files.
A powerful GUI tool with batch processing to edit EXIF/GPS data and completely remove all data (include EXIF) in images.
Show and edit the metadata of image files, analyze and modify EXIF and IPTC-NAA data, and analyze ICC profiles.
Shows images and edit metadata using exiv2 library; GPS data can be shown and modified on a map; optimised to edit comments.
Add .xmp metadata, embed in-frame time-based metadata, export as .csv or .xmp, embed IPTC keywords and captions.
Picture viewer, editor with slide show, scan module, add ons
